# Project Properties
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED (VERSION 2.8)

# We only need debug / release configurations
# For some reason this should be here before PROJECT(..)
SET(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES Debug Release)

# Project code-name and linker language
PROJECT (LibSampleRate)

# debug option
SET (CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE 1)

# Look for all sources that will participate in this build session
FILE(GLOB LIBSAMPLERATE_HEADERS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.h" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/*.h")
FILE(GLOB LIBSAMPLERATE_SOURCES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.c")

SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(${LIBSAMPLERATE_SOURCES} PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX )

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES( "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include" )

ADD_LIBRARY(libsamplerate STATIC ${LIBSAMPLERATE_HEADERS} ${LIBSAMPLERATE_SOURCES})
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DLIBSAMPLERATE_EXPORTS)

# Added a "d" suffix to the executable in debug build
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(libsamplerate PROPERTIES DEBUG_POSTFIX "d")
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(libsamplerate PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib")
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(libsamplerate PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib")
